import pandas as pd
import pgeocode

# Load your CSV file
df = pd.read_csv("temperature_data.csv")

# Initialize the pgeocode geocoder
geocoder = pgeocode.Nominatim("us")  # 'us' for the United States

# Function to get ZIP code from latitude and longitude
def get_zip_code(lat, lon):
    result = geocoder.query_postal_code_from_coordinates(lat, lon)
    return result.postal_code if result else None

# Apply function to your data
df["ZIP Code"] = df.apply(lambda row: get_zip_code(row["latitude"], row["longitude"]), axis=1)

# Save the updated dataframe to a new CSV
df.to_csv("temperature_data_with_zip.csv", index=False)
